AddOrUpdateTextBlocklistItemsOptions.description: The request to add blocklistItems to a text blocklist.

AddOrUpdateTextBlocklistItemsResult.description: The response of adding blocklistItems to the text blocklist.

blocklistItems.description: Array of blocklistItems have been added.

type.description: Specifies the type of the advanced setting.

name.description: Specifies the name of the advanced setting.

sources.description: Specifies the sources of the advanced setting. This field is optional.

version.description: Specifies the version of the advanced setting. This field is optional.

AdvancedSettingResult.description: Describes a single result of analysis under a specific advanced setting.

resultCode.description: The result code of the analysis.

resultCodeDetail.description: Detailed information about the result code. This field is optional.

image.description: The image needs to be analyzed.

categories.description: The categories will be analyzed. If they are not assigned, a default set of analysis results for the categories will be returned.

outputType.description: This refers to the type of image analysis output. If no value is assigned, the default value will be "FourSeverityLevels".

values.name: FourSeverityLevels
values.description: Output severities in four levels, the value could be 0,2,4,6.

domain.description:
The domain of the text for analysis. Allowed values: Medical, Generic.
This field is optional, with a default value of Generic.

task.description:
The task type for the text analysis. Type of task: QnA, Summarization.
This field is optional, with a default value of Summarization.

qna.description:
The user's question input in a QnA scenario.
This field is optional, but if the task type is set to QnA, it becomes required.

text.description: The specific text that needs to be checked.

groundingSources.description:
Leverages a vast array of grounding sources to validate AI-generated text.
Limit: Restrictions on the total amount of grounding sources that can be analyzed in a single request are 55K characters.

reasoning.description:
A value indicating if the output includes an explanation for the identified groundedness.
This field is optional, with a default value of false.

llmResource.description:
Connection details for the LLM resource. 
This field will be used only when the 'reasoning' field is set to true; otherwise, it will be ignored.

ungroundedDetected.description: Indicates whether the text exhibits ungroundedness.

ungroundedPercentage.description:
Specifies the proportion of the text identified as ungrounded, 
expressed as a decimal between 0 and 1,
where 0 indicates no grounded content and 1 indicates entirely grounded content..

ungroundedDetails.description: Provides insights into ungrounded content with specific examples and percentages.

text.description: The text needs to be analyzed if it attempt to jailbreak. We support a maximum of 1k Unicode characters (Unicode code points) in the text of one request.
The text needs to be analyzed. We support a maximum of 10k Unicode characters (Unicode code points) in the text of one request.

categories.description: The categories will be analyzed. If they are not assigned, a default set of analysis results for the categories will be returned.

haltOnBlocklistHit.description: When set to true, further analyses of harmful content will not be performed in cases where blocklists are hit. When set to false, all analyses of harmful content will be performed, whether or not blocklists are hit.

outputType.description: This refers to the type of text analysis output. If no value is assigned, the default value will be "FourSeverityLevels".

values.name: FourSeverityLevels
values.description: Output severities in four levels, the value could be 0,2,4,6.

values.name: EightSeverityLevels
values.description: Output severities in eight levels, the value could be 0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7.

AnalyzeTextPromptInjectionOptions.description: The text prompt injection attacks analysis request.

userPrompt.description: The user prompt needs to be analyzed if it attempts to do direct injection attacks.

documents.description: The documents needs to be analyzed if they attempt to do direct or indirect injection attacks.

AnalyzeTextPromptInjectionResult.description: The text injection attacks analysis response.

userPromptAnalysis.description: Direct injection analysis result for user prompt input.

documentsAnalysis.description: Direct and indirect injection attacks analysis result for documents input.

text.description: The text needs to be analyzed. We support a maximum of 1k Unicode characters (Unicode code points) in the text of one request.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

BaseSetting.description: Represents the base settings of a safety policy.

harmConfigId.description: Specifies the harm configuration ID. This field is optional.

sources.description: Specifies the sources of the harm. This field is optional.

blockingCriteria.description: Specifies the blocking criteria for CMP dedicated. This field is optional.

blocking.description: Indicates if blocking is enabled. The default value is false. This field is optional.

enabled.description: Indicates if the result for this harm configuration is enabled. The default value is true. This field is optional.

BaseSettingResult.description: Describes a single result of analysis under a specific harm category.

harmConfigId.description: The identifier for the harm configuration used. This field is optional.

resultCode.description: The result code of the analysis.

resultCodeDetail.description: Detailed information about the result code. This field is optional.

isBlockingCriteriaMet.description: Indicates whether the blocking criteria are met based on the analysis result. This field is optional.

BlockingCriteria.description: Only one blockingCriteria can be set, as the detection result of harmCategory can only be either severity either level either isDetected

ContentItem.description: The content of a message, which can be either text or an image.

kind.description: The type of content, either 'text' or 'image'.

text.description: The text content, applicable if kind is 'text'.

image.description: The image content, applicable if kind is 'image'. Encoded in base64.

HarmMessageItem.description: The content of a message, which can be either text or an image.

Image.description: The image can be either base64 encoded bytes or a blob URL. You can choose only one of these options. If both are provided, the request will be refused.

base64.description: The Base64 encoding of the image.

blobUrl.description: The blob url of the image.

severity.description: The value increases with the severity of the input content. The value of this field is determined by the output type specified in the request. The output type could be FourSeverityLevels, and the output value can be 0, 2, 4, 6.

ImageData.description: The image can be either base64 encoded bytes or a blob URL. You can choose only one of these options. If both are provided, the request will be refused. The maximum image size is 2048 x 2048 pixels and should not exceed 4 MB, while the minimum image size is 50 x 50 pixels.

content.description: The Base64 encoding of the image.

blobUrl.description: The blob url of the image.

utf8.description: Indicate the index when encoding is UTF-8.

utf16.description: Indicate the index when encoding is UTF-16.

codePoint.description: Indicate the index with code point format.

LLMResource.description: Connection details for the LLM resource.

resourceType.description: LLM resource type. The default value is AzureOpenAI.

MessageItem.description: The content of a message, which can be either text or an image.

ModelAnalysisResult.description: Represents the output of a model analysis.

resultCode.description: The result code of the analysis.

resultCodeDetail.description: Detailed information about the result code.

modelOutput.description: The output of the model analysis.

sources.description: The sources that the model analyzes.

ModelOutput.description: Represents the output of a model analysis.

output.description: The output detail of the model. The key is string, the value can be string, boolean, float, integer and etc

value.description: The SafetyPolicy items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The TextBlocklist items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The TextBlocklistItem items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

PromptInjectionDetail.description: Details the output of an analysis, including detection status, severity, and additional information.

promptInjection.description: Indicates whether prompt injection was detected.

crossDomain.description: Indicates whether cross-domain issues were detected.

ProtectedMaterialAnalysisResult.description: The text protected material analysis response.

query.description: The user's question input in a QnA scenario.

RemoveTextBlocklistItemsOptions.description: The request to remove blocklistItems from a text blocklist.

baseSettings.description: The base settings of the policy.

advancedSettings.description: The advanced settings of the policy.

SafetyPolicyAnalysisOutput.description: Details the output of an analysis, including detection status, severity, and additional information.

detected.description: Indicates whether harmful content was detected.

severity.description: The severity of the detected content, on a scale of 0 to 7.

advanced.description: A dictionary to include more scores, explanations, rewrites, etc.

SafetyPolicyAnalyzeOption.description: Defines the options for analyzing content with a safety policy.

safetyPolicyInline.description: The inline safety policy to be applied during analysis. One of `safetyPolicyName` or `safetyPolicyInline` must be provided.

safetyPolicyName.description: The name of a predefined safety policy to be applied during analysis. One of `safetyPolicyName` or `safetyPolicyInline` must be provided.

SafetyPolicyAnalyzeResponse.description: Represents the analysis response obtained by applying a safety policy.

baseSettingResults.description: A collection of base setting analysis results.

advancedSettingResults.description: A collection of advanced setting analysis results.

baseSettings.description: The base settings of the policy.

advancedSettings.description: The advanced settings of the policy.

blocklistItemId.description: The service will generate a BlocklistItemId, which will be a UUID.

blocklistName.description: The name of the matched blocklist.

blocklistItemId.description: The ID of the matched item.

blocklistItemText.description: The content of the matched item.

severity.description: The value increases with the severity of the input content. The value of this field is determined by the output type specified in the request. The output type could be FourSeverityLevels or EightSeverity Levels, and the output value can be 0, 2, 4, 6 or 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7.

TextPromptInjectionResult.description: The text injection attacks analysis response.

attackDetected.description: Analysis result for whether the prompt is classified as an injection attack.

UngroundednessDetails.description: The detailed information about a text identified as ungroundedness.

offset.description: The offset when grounded text starts.

length.description: The length of the grounded text.

reason.description:
The explanation for detected ungroundedness, enhancing understanding.
Only when the 'reasoning' field in the input is set to true 'reason' field will be returned.

messages.description: A collection of messages for analysis.

UnifiedAnalyzeResult.description: The response structure for unified model analysis.

modelsAnalysis.description: A collection of model analysis results.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.

Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.name: maxpagesize
Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.description: The maximum number of result items per page.

Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.name: skip
Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to skip.

Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.name: top
Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to return.
